data.field:
PerlMonks-Related Resources on Other Servers

  • [http://tinymicros.com/pm/|PerlMonks Stats] (see [id://523903])
  • [http://tinymicros.com/ptav/|PerlMonks Threaded Article Viewer] (see [132218])
  • [http://www.mikero.com/misc/code/pm-addicts/|PM Addicts] ranks monks by status in [id:/50771|Other Users]
  • [http://mini-cb60.datenzoo.de/|CB60] chatterbox history (see [id://531067])
  • Another [http://nbpfaus.net/~pfau/cbhistory.cgi?site=PM|CB history] (see [id://220030])
  • A [http://desert-island.me.uk/perl/im2/karma.html|CB Karma accountant] and a [http://desert-island.me.uk/cgi-bin/pmlinks.cgi|CB URL logger] (see [im2])
  • a [http://gmax.oltrelinux.com/cgi-bin/cbnodes.cgi|Categorized Best Nodes] search engine (see [id://344377])
  • [http://desert-island.me.uk:8000/perl/pmplanet.html|PMPlanet], a funky monk map by [theorbtwo]
  • [http://prlmnks.org/|PrlMnks.org]: a [id://576114]. Note: Not currently active.
  • [http://www.perlmonk.org|perlmonk.org] (see [jcwren]) Several monks have PM-related apps hosted there.
      Notably:
    • [http://tanktalus.perlmonk.org/cbstats/|Chatterbox Stats] (see [id://710406])
    • [http://mcdarren.perlmonk.org/googlemonks/|google earth monks] (see [id://558846])
    • [http://jdporter.perlmonk.org/snippets_by_title.html|Snippets Index] (see [id://619683])
